titleStmt.title: An account of some remarkable eclipses, and the effects observ'd to ensue thereupon Being a translation from the Latin out of Alstedius's Thesaurus Chronologiæ, for the consideration of the English reader at this great eclipse of the sun, on the 13th. of September, 1699.
Thesaurus chronologiae. Selections
titleStmt.author: Alsted, Johann Heinrich, 1588-1638.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Geo. Conyers, at the Golden Ring in Little Britain,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Golden Ring in Little Britain
